item.title: Ez Mapo Tofu
item.description: Ingredients neutral oil 2 packets of Lee Kum Kee mapo tofu sauce 1 brown onion, sliced finely 2 cloves garlic, grated/sliced/chopped 1 knob of ginger, grated/sliced/chopped 1 tablespoon oyster sauce 2 teaspoons soy sauce 500g pork mince 900g tofu, cut into cubes spring onions (garnish, optional) Instructions
